comments.comments_text: Corner kick. Gaston Pereiro (PSV) is ready to send the ball into the box.

comments.comments_text: The score has changed – 0:1. Gaston Pereiro sends a fantastic cross into the box from the corner. Luuk de Jong (PSV) jumps highest and plants a header down inside the left post.

comments.comments_text: A horde of players are waiting inside the penalty area for a cross from the corner, but Christian Eriksen (Tottenham) takes it short.

comments.comments_text: Christian Eriksen (Tottenham) swings in the corner kick, but one of the defenders leaps highest to head the ball away.

comments.comments_text: Hirving Lozano (PSV) sends in the corner, but fails to find the head of any of his teammates, allowing the defence to clear. The referee and his assistant both point at the corner flag. PSV will have an opportunity to threaten the opposition's goal.

comments.comments_text: It's in the back of the net! Harry Kane (Tottenham) tries his luck from the edge of the box and his shot takes a deflection and goes past the stranded Jeroen Zoet. He makes it 2:1.

comments.comments_text: What was Daniel Schwaab (PSV) thinking? He will not get away with that. The referee shows him a yellow card.
